name: BunnyZ Pizzeria // official game // early release/testing
name_original: BunnyZ Pizzeria // official game // early release/testing
description:
Welcome to Bunnyz Pizzeria!  Survive until 6:00AM! Collect coins to buy things in shop to help you during your nights! Survive all 3 nights to win!

============================================

INSTRUCTIONS:

-LEFT/RIGHT arrow keys and UP/DOWN arrow keys to move

-E to interact with things

-when in the office if you hear knocking then shock the left door, Bunny was trying to get in

-if you see glowing eyes in the right window then click the "go hide" button to hide in the locker when the eyes are gone click the locker to leave it, Trickster is watching you...stay in the closet until the eyes are gone, Then go back to the office

-always go reset the music box, If it is not running then violet the chicken will come and get you, There's no stopping her then...(check if the music box is running by going to the control panel)

(some features said/shown are not in game)

============================================

features in game:

-survive only 1 night

-you CAN'T buy things or collect coins yet

-if you see glowing eyes in the right window then click the "go hide" button to hide in the locker when the eyes are gone click the locker to leave it, Trickster is watching you...stay in the closet until the eyes are gone, Then go back to the office

-when in the office if you hear knocking then shock the left door, Bunny was trying to get in (make sure to hit the shock button  IMMEDIATELY when you hear the noise)

============================================If you have any bugs, issues, concerns or suggestions please tell me!

(game recommend for any computer players even if that's PC WINDOWS or CHROME/GOOGLE whatever as long as your on a computer/laptop of sort you should be able to play it, However it is NOT recommend for any mobile player whether its phone or ipad whatever if your on mobile you can NOT play it as it wont work) (No sorry i'm not going to be making a mobile friendly version)
